episodes.overview: A woman comes in for a heart transplant, and Connie persuades her to accept an experimental procedure that has never been tried before. Ric leaves Nick in charge while he is at the university, but Jac does not approve of his handling of a cancer patient's treatment and a past conflict between them resurfaces.

episodes.name: Into Your Own Hands
episodes.overview: Mark gets over involved in a case which causes disastrous consequences. Meanwhile, Nick Jordan rocks Diane's world which may affect her relationship with Ric.

episodes.name: Let it Shine
episodes.overview: When Nick learns that Ric is away from Holby for the day he is determined to get one over on him. Meanwhile, Kyla learns that the best way to be a leader is to be herself.

episodes.name: Leap in the Dark
episodes.overview: Matt's parents want him discharged from hospital to be treated at home, while Mark blames himself for the stabbing. Donna flirts with a handsome physiotherapist, though Kyla warns her to stay away from him. The treatment of a heart patient causes conflict, as Connie wants to try the manufactured pump she helped develop, but Elliot is adamant a transplant is required.

episodes.name: Snake in the Grass
episodes.overview: Nick performs an unnecessary operation in his campaign for a transfer. However, when the patient's condition worsens, Jac is forced to take matters into her own hands. Matt and Dean undergo a student assessment with Lord Byrne, but may not be up to the challenge. Mark is plagued by his secrets as he treats a woman with problems similar to his own.

episodes.name: Passing On
episodes.overview: Connie is devastated when her patient collapses and there's not enough time to arrange a heart transplant. Nick tries to get Diane on his side by letting her perform a difficult procedure for the first time, while Ric talks her into taking the research position full time. Kyla brings Max to work as he is a diabetic and she is worried about his blood sugar levels.

episodes.name: Quality Time
episodes.overview: Elliot fears for his wife, who has motor neurone disease and whose health appears to be getting worse. He also regrets their decision to keep her condition a secret from Martha - not realising she knows something is up and has persuaded Joseph to help her learn the truth. Sam uncovers a family secret when he treats a boy with two mothers who is undergoing a heart transplant.

episodes.name: Honesty
episodes.overview: Ric risks his friendship with Diane in an attempt to save her from Nick Jordan's clutches. Meanwhile, Joseph finds himself in trouble at work and Matt makes a career changing decision.

episodes.name: Judge Not, Lest Ye Be Judged
episodes.overview: Diane is determined to prove Ric wrong about Nick Jordan and a desperate Tricia tries to keep the truth from a suspicious Chrissie.

episodes.name: Short Cuts
episodes.overview: Joseph struggles to stay in control as tension builds between Nick and Ric. Donna is thrilled to have a new man in her life but can Justin really give her what she truly needs?

episodes.name: Lead Us Not Into Temptation
episodes.overview: Helena develops complications following Nick's rushed surgery, putting Diane in a difficult position when she realises the problem should have been noticed during the first operation. Sam breaks the rules to help a recovering alcoholic who needs a heart transplant after learning the patient has a young son, and Justin tries to flirt with Kyla again.

episodes.name: Games of Chance
episodes.overview: An inquest into the death of Helena Bosman throws the spotlight on Nick and Diane. Meanwhile, Sam plays a practical joke on Joseph.

episodes.name: One Tender Kiss
episodes.overview: Diane is told to work under Ric's supervision when she is blamed for Helen's death, but she is determined to clear her name and attempts to secretly record Nick confessing to his error. A new assistant general manager starts work at the hospital, and soon invites Donna to the May ball, while Matt gets a second job in the admin department to pay off his debts.

episodes.name: Abracadabra
episodes.overview: Abra supervises Diane as he covers for Ric for a fortnight, and reveals he would be keen to work at the hospital permanently - but his determination to perform an operation tempts him to bend the rules, and ruins his chances. Tricia tells Chrissie about her relationship with Mark, and decides to have her surgery moved forward.

episodes.name: Invasion
episodes.overview: Chrissie panics when Don Bosman returns to the hospital to get Helena's body and finds out her heart was donated without his consent. Dillon's condition worsens after being readmitted, leading Sam to discover he has failed to conquer his drinking habit. Meanwhile, jealousy gets the better of Kyla, who berates Justin for behaving unprofessionally after catching him flirting with Donna.

episodes.name: Promises to Keep
episodes.overview: Elliot lets his personal feelings get the better of him when Gina is re-admitted. Sam is put on report but continues to do things on his own terms - will he learn his lesson?

episodes.name: The Truth Will Out
episodes.overview: Nic Jordan steps up his campaign to get back into CT. Mark tries to save Chrissie from a painful truth, but unearths shocking news about Tricia.

episodes.name: Extreme Measures
episodes.overview: Jordan helps Connie save the day when a black tie charity dinner turns into a disaster zone. In an attempt to ingratiate himself with Kyla, Justin offers to look after Max.

episodes.name: I Am Not What I Am
episodes.overview: Matt tries to raise some money by signing up for clinical trials, after his landlord evicts him over unpaid rent , and Lola is angry when she receives a postcard from her globe-trotting daughter. Donna helps with a drugs audit, but ends up flirting with Bradley.

episodes.name: Looking After Number One
episodes.overview: Bradley outlines his cost-cutting plans for the hospital, dividing opinions among the staff, especially when he suggests they could perform more operations to earn a Ã‚Â£3million bonus. Joseph returns to the wards, but it is clear his OCD is not under control when he insists on scrubbing his hands repeatedly and fumbles a simple procedure.

episodes.name: Conscience
episodes.overview: Lola makes a drastic decision regarding baby Leeanne's care. Reg wonders if Bradley's intentions towards Donna are honourable. Jac works closely with Joseph.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: Michael faces his appeal hearing, and uses the opportunity to try to patch things up with Connie, while Sam shares a secret with Chrissie. Lola discovers Leanne's father Steve has been admitted, and becomes convinced he is a drug user.

episodes.name: Team Holby
episodes.overview: Connie's heart battles her mind as she wonders if she should stay at Holby. Mark learns to respect the way Tricia wants to handle her cancer.

episodes.name: Horses to Water
episodes.overview: Matt arrives for his first day in the hospital as a doctor, but soon realises how hard the role will be when he begins to suspect an elderly woman is being bullied by a foster child, while Elliot meets Gina when she arrives for an appointment. Reg becomes flustered when he sees Donna walking out of the staff shower, and grows increasingly jealous of her relationship with Bradley.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Matt and Donna row over Bridie's death, with both keen to blame the other, but the arrival of the nurse's grandmother visiting her boyfriend in the hospital gives the doctor a chance to offer an olive branch. Connie offers Sam a position as trainee rep as the pair grow closer, much to Chrissie's annoyance, and a patient's dad asks Lola out on a date.

episodes.name: Nothing Ventured Nothing Lost
episodes.overview: The hospital staff have their work cut out after a car pile-up, giving Kyla the chance to earn some extra money to put toward her legal fight to keep Max. After their night of passion, Connie and Sam flirt with each other despite professional disagreements as they treat an injured couple, and Mark prepares to pop the question to Tricia.

episodes.name: Better the Devil You Know
episodes.overview: Abra returns to the hospital, but Ric is not happy to be working with him - especially when he learns the surgeon has been making promises to patients that he will struggle to keep. Meanwhile, Mickie develops a crush on a patient, but is worried asking her out may harm her chances of getting into medical school.

episodes.name: Star Maker
episodes.overview: Abra tries to help a patient waiting for a transplant by offering to operate with an animal organ, despite the procedure being illegal, and asks Mickie to help him in theatre. Elliot monitors Margaret's condition as she returns from her stem cell treatment in Singapore, believing her case mirrors that of his wife, Gina.

episodes.name: Just Another Day
episodes.overview: Lola must persuade a reluctant Ric to help her to gain custody of Leanne.

episodes.name: Now or Never
episodes.overview: Tricia becomes emotional when her attempts to reunite a dying man with his drug-abusing son are too close to home, and Mark organises a rushed wedding with the ailing nurse. Matt struggles to understand why his patient won't respond to medication, questioning whether Donna administered it correctly, while Chrissie and Kyla argue over the running of the ward.

episodes.name: Taking Liberties
episodes.overview: Gina puts Connie in a difficult position when she asks her for help behind Elliot's back. Connie must then decide where her loyalties lie. Ric's skills are tested when he has to operate on an obese woman. Matt and Reg find more evidence of drug tampering.

episodes.name: If the Heart Lies
episodes.overview: Gina again asks Connie for advice. Connie feels stuck between her friendship with Elliot and her proffesional duties. After discovering some of Bradley's actions, Ric is determined to get to the bottom of the drug tampering case. Bradley decided to help out Ric.

episodes.name: Moondance
episodes.overview: Connie accompanies Gina to Switzerland for her assisted suicide, but cannot bear the thought of Elliot not being there and calls the doctor, who immediately flies over. Bradley finalises his move to St Luke's, but angers Donna by referring to her as an 'ally', and a drug-abusing patient reminds Joseph of his own problems.

episodes.name: Before A Fall
episodes.overview: The hospital holds an emergency drill to see how the staff would cope with a terrorist attack.

episodes.name: Shot in the Dark
episodes.overview: Tricia learns her operation has been postponed but is shocked to find out how far Mark will go to get her back on the list.

episodes.name: Fly Me to the Moon
episodes.overview: Abra attempts to steal some HIV drugs for a patient and he begins to flirt with Kyla. Joseph returns to work after his overdose and works with Elliot who is grateful for the distraction from Gina's death.

episodes.name: Sins of the Fathers
episodes.overview: Ric's complicity in Abra's misdeeds forces him into a decision.

episodes.name: One for My Baby
episodes.overview: Ric's complicity in Abra's misdeeds forces him into a decision.

episodes.name: The Unforgiven
episodes.overview: While Tricia fights for her life, Mark battles with his guilt over the accident.

episodes.name: It's Been a Long Day
episodes.overview: Enigmatic new surgeon Dan Clifford rocks up to Holby, but whose side is he on?

episodes.name: The Bitterest Pill
episodes.overview: Clifford puts pressure on Abra whilst digging for dirt.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.overview: A rival prompts Jac to go in for the kill with Joseph. Mark clashes with Connie.

episodes.name: The Good Fight
episodes.overview: Lola discovers she could lose Leanne and plays dirty.

episodes.name: The Very Thought of You
episodes.overview: Clifford makes Lola finally face up to some home truths regarding Leanne's future.

episodes.name: I Know Thee Knot
episodes.overview: Sam feels he's losing control of the situation with Connie and the baby.

episodes.name: The Games People Play
episodes.overview: Clifford is hot on Abra's heels - will he catch him this time?

episodes.name: The End of the World as We Know It
episodes.overview: Abra has been getting away with his drugs scam, but this time Clifford won't let him go.

episodes.name: Face Value
episodes.overview: A guest of Clifford's only strengthens Diane's paranoia. When a career enhancing opportunity presents, Jac works Clifford and Joseph to try and get in on the action.

episodes.name: Feast or Famine
episodes.overview: Diane's eagerness to please Clifford results in a somewhat unusual outcome.

episodes.name: Into the Dark
episodes.overview: Chrissie makes a shocking discovering about Sam's home life.

episodes.name: Blood Ties
episodes.overview: Sam's reputation is under fire following Chrissie's shock departure.

episodes.name: I Feel Pretty
episodes.overview: Sam has a fight on his hands when the gossip starts about him and Jade.

episodes.name: Can't Buy Me Love
episodes.overview: There's tension between Harvey and Kyla, and greedy Donna comes back down to earth.

episodes.name: The Borders of Sleep
episodes.overview: Jac realises she's getting nowhere fast, Kyla and Harvey reach a new understanding.

episodes.name: Stargazer
episodes.overview: Faye and Jac lock horns over Joseph, and Maddy clashes with Lola.

episodes.name: What Lies Beneath
episodes.overview: The police grill Faye about what happened to her husband back in Dubai.

episodes.name: Bedlam
episodes.overview: The truth about Nikki changes the friendship between Matt and Dean forever.

episodes.name: Is there Something I Should Know?
episodes.overview: Faye finds herself drawn into the darker side of Kyla and Harvey's relationship.

episodes.name: Paranoid Android
episodes.overview: Jac is desperate to get involved with pioneering telesurgery that's taking place.

episodes.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
episodes.overview: Sam gets a shock when an old friend turns up the hospital as he arrives for work.

episodes.name: Leap of Faith
episodes.overview: Lola treats two schoolgirls injured in a horrific car accident.

episodes.name: Deep Dark Truthful Mirror
episodes.overview: Kyla and Harvey's turbulent relationship reaches a shocking climax.

episodes.name: After the Fall
episodes.overview: Kyla struggles to hold it together as her world lies in ruins.

episodes.name: Trust
episodes.overview: Kyla is thrown a curveball as she decides to pull herself together for Max's sake.

episodes.name: The Human Jungle
episodes.overview: Sparks fly when Kyla receives a surprise visitor to Harvey's wake.

episodes.name: An Affair to Forget
episodes.overview: Joseph sets out to save his parents' marriage.

episodes.name: Another Country
episodes.overview: Diane makes a momentous decision after being forced to face the truth.

episodes.name: Close Relations
episodes.overview: Elliot tries to talk Diane out of resigning from her post.

episodes.name: Something's Gotta Give
episodes.overview: Lola returns from her convalescence to find the staff reeling from Diane's death.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.overview: Chaos descends on Holby when the nurses are pushed to breaking point.

episodes.name: Past Imperfect
episodes.overview: There's a shock in store for Connie when her past catches up with her.

episodes.name: Under the Radar
episodes.overview: Sparks fly when Elliot is on the receiving end of an unexpected complaint.

episodes.name: The Long and Winding Road
episodes.overview: Just when Chrissie thinks she's found her ideal man, Anton pushes her to the limit.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Joseph's fears look set to become reality as Jac and Lord Byrne's relationship progresses.

episodes.name: Temporary Insanity
episodes.overview: As Lord Byrne recovers from his stroke, will Joseph be able to reconcile with his father?

episodes.name: Bad Reputation
episodes.overview: It's Ric and Thandie's wedding day, but the groom has serious doubts.

episodes.name: Damned If You Do
episodes.overview: Jac sets her sights on a new goal. Abra smells a rat when Ric returns from honeymoon.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.overview: Clifford encourages a patient with Down's Syndrome to go against his mother's wishes.

episodes.name: Guilt by Association
episodes.overview: Joseph tries to warn Faye about Sam after catching him and Chrissie together.

episodes.name: Friends Reunited
episodes.overview: Maddy has a nightmare day when Hannah's six-year-old daughter overdoses on methadone.

episodes.name: Trial and Retribution
episodes.overview: Clifford steps in to save the day when Louise's stent trial goes horribly wrong.

episodes.name: My Aim is True
episodes.overview: Clifford crashes back down to Earth after getting caught up in a 'Louise whirlwind'.

episodes.name: Duty of Care - Part One
episodes.overview: Medical drama series. A mysterious face from Abra's past turns up at Holby.

episodes.name: Duty of Care Part Two
episodes.overview: Medical drama series. Abra's father is taken ill.

episodes.name: Bitter from the Sweet
episodes.overview: Mark's efforts to rescue Elliot's son James lead him and Donna into a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: The Last Throw
episodes.overview: Clifford is forced to choose between the two women in his life.

episodes.name: No-one Likes a Cry Baby
episodes.overview: Jac learns there is a consultant post available on Keller. Mark finds a weapon.

episodes.name: The Apprentice

episodes.name: Beginnings
episodes.overview: It looks like Serena is going to spend another New Year's Eve alone but after some revellers at a gig are attacked, fate brings more than just a few casualties onto the hospital.

episodes.name: Young Hearts, Run Free
episodes.overview: Arthur ends up being pushed to the limit after he attempts to win Morven's affections. Zosia has the chance of a prestigious research internship in Edinburgh and has to tell Ollie.

episodes.name: The Hope That Kills
episodes.overview: Guy's career continues to go from strength to strength but there is a cost. Essie lets her personal life affect her professional one as she attempts to deal with a difficult mother and son relationship.

episodes.name: Sins of Our Fathers
episodes.overview: Hanssen gets ready to fly back to Sweden to see his family and becomes suspicious that Guy is attempting to wrest control of the hospital something which Guy later publicly announces. Serena looks for reassurance that Hanssen will stay and fight the battle.

episodes.name: Kiss and Tell
episodes.overview: Back on Keller, Arthur finds himself in a compromising situation by Morven's father as Mo awaits the news if she is pregnant or not.

episodes.name: Serenity
episodes.overview: After an army medic shows up on Darwin Ward, tensions increase for Guy and Ollie. Serena has to make a difficult decision following the discovery of a family secret.

episodes.name: A Partnership, Literally
episodes.overview: Somebody from from Dominic's past makes an unwelcome return  and there are some traumatic consequences.

episodes.name: All That Glitters
episodes.overview: Cleared by the police, Dom returns to work but Lee still has the power he needs to hurt him as Austin's condition continues to deteriorate.

episodes.name: All Fall Down
episodes.overview: Bernie starts her first day on the ward trying to put her army life behind her as Arthur's dream of becoming a life donor gets a set back as Serena has to make a decision regarding Jason.

episodes.name: One Under
episodes.overview: Arthur's attempt to save the life of a patient after being hit by a train leaves him burying his head in the sand as Adele ends up getting more than she bargained.

episodes.name: On The Ropes
episodes.overview: Operating on an old school teacher, Ric battles to remain in control as Mo learns that she hasn't won the role of consultant as Serena is worried about introducing Robbie to her family.

episodes.name: Where We Belong
episodes.overview: Bernie ends up having to question what she wants after her future at the hospital is put in doubt. Ollie and Zosia's world is blown apart after a former flame of his shows up.

episodes.name: Who You Are
episodes.overview: Morven is left reeling by a life changing birthday gift as Mo clashes with Sir Dennis over a patient as Ric suffers an emotional outburst.

episodes.name: A Friend in Need
episodes.overview: When Cara makes a move on Raf, complications arise as Arthur receives some shattering news as an old friend of Adele's is admitted to Darwin.

episodes.name: Handle With Care
episodes.overview: Jason shows up on AAU with his seriously ill carer Allan and Serena’s personal involvement manages to affect her professional judgement as Dom tries to support Arthur following the news that his cancer has spread as Cara has her first day on Darwin.

episodes.name: Dark Night of the Soul
episodes.overview: Following the death of his mother, Jesse attempts to reappraise his relationship with his father as Ina is readmitted to Darwin.

episodes.name: Prioritise the Heart
episodes.overview: Bernie has to work alongside an old army colleague and ends up being forced to confront the secrets of the past and face the truth behind her sudden exit from the army as Mr T learns that no one takes him seriously as Serena has a choice to make between her happiness and Jason.

episodes.name: Out of Sight Out of Mind
episodes.overview: Bernie finds herself being served with divorce papers as Austin is admitted in urgent need of a transplant as Zosia persuades a dying patient to act as a guinea pig.

episodes.name: The Coward's Way
episodes.overview: The arrival of her ex sees Bernie trying to keep her secret hidden as the hospital's new psychiatrist Naomi Palmer makes an instant impression on Fletch.

episodes.name: It Tolls For Thee
episodes.overview: Mo finds herself having to listen to her heart instead of her head as Serena's actions leave devastating consequences as Arthur and Morven have a day they won't forget.

episodes.name: Running Out
episodes.overview: Zosia manages to overstep the mark and accuses a patient of a media leak forcing Oliver to deal with an unwelcome dilemma. Zosia comes to a gut-wrenching decision as Serena discovers Bernie is working on AAU, Dominic has to face his fears.

episodes.name: When I Grow Up
episodes.overview: Arthur is determined to proof himself with Hanssen's ambitions as Raf manages to see Naomi in a different light as Oliver tries to get back together with Zosia.

episodes.name: The Sky Is Falling
episodes.overview: Zosia finds herself having to chose between Arthur and her career as Dom finds his loyalty being tested by a familiar face as Bernie finds it hard to find her place on AAU.

episodes.name: I'll Walk You Home
episodes.overview: Zosia begins to question where her loyalties lie as Arthur and Morven have a decision to make as Dom battles his guilt.

episodes.name: Missing You Already
episodes.overview: A major train accident sees Dom with the perfect opportunity to escape back into work mode. Bernie’s husband attempts to to play dirty in the divorce, as he turns her children against her.

episodes.name: The Lone Ranger
episodes.overview: As Jac launches the fully-formed Digby Stent, it looks like that someone has stolen their patent. Dom’s first day back doesn’t go as planned after a forthright new registrar shakes up the ward.

episodes.name: Another Day in Paradise: Part One
episodes.overview: Dominic comes up with a unique way to grieve the loss of his best friend. Raf and Fletch clash after Raf reveals how he really feels about Naomi.

episodes.name: Another Day in Paradise: Part Two
episodes.overview: Jac reaches breaking point when Ollie diverts from her plans.

episodes.name: Children of Men
episodes.overview: Mo struggles with a big choice about her future. Mikey causes more trouble for Fletch.

episodes.name: A Perfect Life
episodes.overview: Essie finds her own life in danger when she tries to help a desperate patient.

episodes.name: From Bournemouth with Love
episodes.overview: Ollie questions his worth on the Darwin team.

episodes.name: Back in the Ring
episodes.overview: Ric questions his surgical skill when he faces losing another young man.

episodes.name: Indefensible
episodes.overview: Bernie faces an ethical dilemma when her wayward son arrives at the hospital.

episodes.name: Little Acorns
episodes.overview: Guy must face his past when an unexpected patient arrives at Holby.

episodes.name: Fractured
episodes.overview: Jac returns from her break but gets a shock when she sees who is working on Darwin.

episodes.name: Protect and Serve
episodes.overview: With Evie still recovering from her fall, Fletch commits to being a better dad.

episodes.name: Brave New World
episodes.overview: Sacha's birthday celebrations don't go quite according to plan.

episodes.name: Say a Little Prayer
episodes.overview:
Fletch is recovering from being attacked. Progress stalls when he loses feeling in his feet. As the paralysis spreads, Raf struggles to diagnose the cause. Will he make a breakthrough before it is too late?

The passionate courtship of a patient and her beau reminds Zosia what she has lost with Ollie. In the dark about Ollie's relationship with Jasmine, Zosia begins to think about the possibility of reconciliation.

A happily engaged patient and her partner present a vision of what might have been for Sacha and Essie. Have they made the right decision in breaking up?

episodes.name: Emotionally Yours
episodes.overview:
Dominic is perturbed when Isaac's former surgical mentor is admitted. Despite the existence of a wife, it's clear there's a personal connection between the two men. Is Dom prepared to accept Isaac's past?

Jasmine is keen to impress Jac professionally and make a connection with her half-sister personally. But will Jac's public acknowledgement of their relationship bring them together or drive them further apart?

Ric is dispatched by Hanssen to deal with the estranged wife of the local MP - the feisty, French Francoise. Will Ric allow himself to succumb to her Gallic charms?

episodes.name: Life in the Freezer
episodes.overview: Mr T comes to Mo's rescue when she fears for her baby's life. Bernie makes a big decision about her future with Serena when an exciting opportunity arises. A big step in his relationship with Isaac puts Dom's friendship with Zosia at risk.

episodes.name: Snakes and Ladders
episodes.overview: An accident in rehab sets back Fletch's recovery, but it's his attitude that proves the biggest obstacle. Can he beat the doom and gloom before pushing away those who are trying to help him? Isaac wants to impress Ric and Dom wants to impress Isaac, but when Dom sidelines his own success to help make Isaac look good they both wind up in trouble. Mo tries to befriend Inga in light of her new role as best man. Her attempts prove futile when she puts her foot in her mouth repeatedly and winds up covered in wee, having made an enemy out of Inga instead.

episodes.name: Into the Abyss
episodes.overview: Hungover Jasmine desperately tries to step up her game in order to win Ric over. Zosia refuses to emotionally engage with a terminally ill patient who reminds her of Arthur. Raf is positive about stepping up his career, but when a charismatic female patient comes in, he questions whether he should actually be spending more time living his life instead of putting work first.

episodes.name: Rocket Man
episodes.overview: Zosia's behaviour continues to spiral out of control leading Jac to become concerned for her. Morven faces her fears when she takes charge of a charming patient.

episodes.name: Black Dog
episodes.overview: ​Ric has been suspended and Tristan is on the prowl. An ever watchful Hanssen pays a heavy price when he takes Jasmine under his wing. When Ollie doubts a patient's credibility and questions Zosia's judgment, the ex-lovers clash. Determined to protect Zosia at any cost, Ollie is blown away by a startling revelation. Aware that she is subject of gossip and struggling to manage her feelings for Bernie, Serena is unprepared for what unfolds on AAU.

episodes.name: Somebody to Love
episodes.overview:
After saving a life in a near-death trauma case, an overconfident Morven clashes with Raf when he is not convinced that her motives are purely professionally.

When Tristan asks Guy for a personal favour, Zosia warns Guy that Tristan is not to be trusted. But Guy strikes a deal with Tristan and his reputation hangs in the balance.

When his living habits are called into question, a determined Dominic fights to prove his worth to Isaac but is unprepared for the consequences of his actions.

episodes.name: Song of Self, Part One
episodes.overview: Part one of two. Guy's plans for his much anticipated Neurosurgical Unit are put in jeopardy when he makes a shocking discovery about Tristan Wood - the Unit's main benefactor. Meanwhile, Serena considers re-kindling her romance with a smitten Robbie but, with Bernie in her thoughts, can she commit to happy ever after with him? And Ric is pressurised to undermine everything he's worked for by Tristan.

episodes.name: Song of Self, Part Two
episodes.overview: Part two of two. A conflicted Guy fights to save Tristan's life, and Raf's budding relationship with Kim is tested when he makes a shocking discovery. Meanwhile, spurred by evidence of Essie's romantic conquests, Sacha tries online dating, but is it really a good match for him?

episodes.name: The Kill List
episodes.overview: Dom stoops to low levels to land an assistant's position after Isaac gets a research grant. Elsewhere, Inga fights for her fiancé attention, and Bernie returns

episodes.name: Parasite
episodes.overview: Matteo's arrival irritates Jac and when the medic discovers his past misdemeanours, she throws down the gauntlet. Elsewhere, Dominic gets emotionally embroiled in a challenging case.

episodes.name: Glass Houses
episodes.overview: Jac puts her patient before her own health concerns, with serious consequences. Elsewhere Raf is taken aback when Parker is brought into hospital and is concerned about the boy's welfare.

episodes.name: Hallelujah
episodes.overview: When Kim gets positive news regarding her kidney treatment, Essie must deal with the imminent departure of Parker, who has been staying with her. Ollie is devastated when Matteo reveals he plans to ask Zosia out. Morven struggles to master her role as teacher, particularly with the unruly Cameron.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
episodes.overview: A terrifying blast from the past upsets Dom's plans for the perfect Christmas with Isaac, while Jac pushes her closest friend away as she waits on some Life changing news.

episodes.name: Just Get on With It
episodes.overview: Mo strives to suppress her true feelings for Mr T, Jasmine is given her last chance on the Acute Assessment Unit, while Essie and Raf comes to blows after a difficult patient.

episodes.name: I Do, I Do, I Do
episodes.overview: When Mo uncovers a secret, Mr T and Inga's Swedish-Style wedding takes a dark turn, While Serena, Elinor and Jason are involved in a car accident.

episodes.name: Aces High
episodes.overview: Oliver must compete for both funding and Jac's support when Matteo pitches a tempting rival project, and Dominic tries to keep his relationship with Isaac a secret from his parents.

episodes.name: Stick or Twist
episodes.overview: Sacha becomes suspicious about Essie and Raf's relationship, and Fletch fights to save his friend Artem's life when the old gambler returns to the Acute Assessment Unit (AAU)

episodes.name: Daylight
episodes.overview: Mo returns from maternity leave and drops a bombshell, while Dominic gets a shock when he realises that going to Hawaii with Isaac is not going to be as straightforward as he hoped.

episodes.name: Of Lions and Lambs
episodes.overview: A grief-striker Derena returns to work looking for answers and Dominic is in turmoil when Isaac reveals a devastating betrayal.  Meanwhile, Ollie and Zosia question if they are ready for the next stage in their relationships.

episodes.name: Losing Game
episodes.overview: A familiar face makes a return under shocking circumstances, and grief-stricken Serena takes an eager Jasmine under her wing, but both get more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Four Letter Word
episodes.overview: Jac may finally acknowledge her feelings for Matteo, and Bernie sees through Serena's attempts to keep everything normal. Meanwhile, Raf is determined to remain professional when Kim reached out for help.

episodes.name: What We Pretend to Be
episodes.overview: Isaac's dark side comes to surface as his relationship with Dom reaches breaking point, and Serena's mentoring of Jasmine gives Morven cause for concern.

episodes.name: The Price We Pay
episodes.overview: Raf enthusiastically makes plans for the future with Kim and the twins he is to be a father of.  However, his hopes and dreams looks set to be dashed by a series of revelations.

episodes.name: Other People's Dreams
episodes.overview: Jasmine fights chronic fatigue while trying to impress Serena, Essie wants to become Parker's foster mother, and Oliver tries to maintain his new zen outlook when rivals Jac and Matteo receive project funding.

episodes.name: The Hangover
episodes.overview: Dominic's trust in Issac is rocked when a patient they both know is abandoned at the hospital having overdosed, and Fletch makes a shocking discovery about the man Morven has been messaging.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Essie is shocked when Parker turns up with a friend, while Zosia is harbouring a secret from Ollie and is horrified to learn that Isaac knows what it is.

episodes.name: Unbreakable
episodes.overview: Isaac lashes out when Dom questions their relationship, Serena is dealt a further blow after Elinor's death, and a drunken mistake prompts Ollie to take a big step in his relationship with Zosia.

episodes.name: It's Only Love If It Hurts
episodes.overview: Serena faces her demons and comes to a heart-wrenching conclusion, Zosia takes action when Issac reveals his true colours, and Mo risks her professional reputation.

episodes.name: Someone to Look After Me
episodes.overview: Dominic and Isaac's toxic relationship finally reaches boiling point, Fletch's world is shattered by a life-changing revelation, while Matteo tries to reunite Jac and Jasmine.

episodes.name: Past Imperfect
episodes.overview: Jac and Matteo's relationship seem to be heading in the right direction, but when she becomes suspicious of his motives, her investigation unearth skeletons in his closet.

episodes.name: Two Hearts
episodes.overview: Matteo and Jac clash over the patient, Sacha Tries to keep a secret from Essie, and Ric cracks the whip on the Acute Assessment Unit Floor, But a surprise visitor throws him off his game

episodes.name: Gold Star
episodes.overview: Mo finds herself caught between pregnant patient Trixie and Derwoods mother, Oliver's eagerness to impress causes friction between Bernie and Ric, While Sacha revisits his own childhood when his first girlfriend is admitted.

episodes.name: The Heart Is a Small Thing
episodes.overview: Matteo wants to prove his marriage is over, but a face from the past brings up painful memories of his life before Holby, Meanwhile, Dominic struggles with his first day back.

episodes.name: Project Aurous
episodes.overview: Jac's job and livelihood are at risk when a mystery patient arrives on Darwin and seeks help, while Keller welcomes a new face to the team.  Elsewhere, Oliver has his mind preoccupied with a surprise from Zosia.

episodes.name: Enigma
episodes.overview: Lofty is unexpectedly confronted with his past and realises that he has to come to terms with the life changing choices he has made, while Mo is ecstatic to be offered Jac's job.

episodes.name: Twist of the Knife
episodes.overview: As a personal emergency strikes, Mo Makes a heart-wrenching decision, and when Nina oversteps the mark with a patient on AAU, her judgement is called into question.

episodes.name: The Hard Way Home
episodes.overview:
Dominic and Sacha clash professionally, and with Jac and Jasmine at odds, Fran makes it her business to reunite them - with unsettling consequences,

Meanwhile a new arrival on Darwin gets more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: For the Love of Maureen
episodes.overview: It's crunch time for Mo, who has some difficult life choices to make, and a patient who is dear to Ric forces him to try to mend broken ties.  Meanwhile Jasmine has growing suspicious of Fran's intensions with Jac.

episodes.name: For You May Be the Next to Die...
episodes.overview: As Jasmine begins to investigate the past, She makes a shocking discovery, while a misunderstanding leaves a vulnerable Dom at odds with his new friend Lofty.

episodes.name: Paper Wishes
episodes.overview:
Jac buries herself in work, determined to save he life of a scared patient, while Sacha is forced to confront his faith when his mother sets him up on a blind date. 

Plus, Donna returns

episodes.name: Keeping The Faith
episodes.overview: A grieving Morven will not accept the circumstances of a close tragedy, while a familiar face arrives on Keller for emergency surgery, putting Sacha in a compromising position.

episodes.name: Sleep Well
episodes.overview: Jac and Fran get the shock of their lives when someone from their past turns up at the hospital while Raf realises that he likes Essie more than he's letting on.

episodes.name: Going the Distance
episodes.overview: Essie worries that she is not being a good foster parent to Parker, and a tricky patient diagnosis throws Morven straight in at the deep end on her first day back.

episodes.name: Baggage
episodes.overview: Donna is dealt a cruel blow by her ex, but assistance is on hand from a surprising source. Elsewhere Dominic wants to uncover the truth about Lofty's life, but he is not ready for what unfolds.

episodes.name: The Evolution of Woman
episodes.overview: Nina strikes a deal with a face from her past, party animal Morven makes a regretful decision, and Sacha struggles with the new woman in his life.

episodes.name: Go Ugly Early
episodes.overview: Bernie is confronted with an impossible situation, Ollie and Zosia are made an offer they cannot refuse, and Lofty has fallen out of favour with Dom.

episodes.name: Calm Before the Storm
episodes.overview: Guy requests Oliver's help with a patient, hoping to foster support for a new research proposal, Sacha's rabbi is taken seriously ill. Nina questions Matteo's feelings for her.

episodes.name: Wildest Dreams
episodes.overview: Oliver struggles with the thought that Tara's death could of been prevented, while Zosia is offered a chance to advance her career. Meanwhile, Lofty worries Dom still has feelings for him.

episodes.name: Keep On Running
episodes.overview: When events take a tragic turn during the Holby Half Marathon, Lofty is forced to finally confront his feelings for Dom and Fletch must enlist Jac's help to treat a patient.

episodes.name: How Loud It Is
episodes.overview: Hanssen is forced to confront his past when a familiar face arrives as a registrar, and Zosia finally relaxes into some wedding planning, but Guy's behaviour sparks fresh concern.

episodes.name: The Man Who Sold the World
episodes.overview: As Guy's behaviour becomes increasingly erratic, Zosia's concerns put her in an impossible position, and Donna is shocked when her patient has a surprising visitor.

episodes.name: Veil of Tears - Part One
episodes.overview: It is the day of Oliver and Zosia's wedding, and as the family and friends gather, the arrival of a particular guest threatens to ruin their happy day.

episodes.name: Veil of Tears - Part Two
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the wedding, Zosia has a hard decision to make, while Dom and Lofty are in an awkward situation when Dom's boyfriend turns up on Keller.

episodes.name: Left Behind
episodes.overview: Matteo makes a stranger recognise Nina on the ward, and Fredrik tries to impress Hanssen, but only winds up testing his patience.

episodes.name: The Coming Storm
episodes.overview: Fletch must deliver some bad news as the reality of being Director of Nursing set in, and the arrival of a familiar face leaves Essie contemplating an emotional farewell.

episodes.name: Thicker than Water
episodes.overview: Fredrick and Sara need to convince Hanssen to give them his professional backing, and an impromptu visit from a loved one gives Raf food for thought. Oliver and Matteo go head to head to win over Damon.

episodes.name: Things Left Unsaid
episodes.overview: Nina must decide if she can trust Fredrick when he discovers a secret that forces her to question her future with Matteo, and Oliver is haunted by a face from the past.

episodes.name: Know Yourself, Know Your Enemy
episodes.overview: On the day of Ric's coroner's court hearing, Donna discovers contradictory evidence that threatens his defence, and Dom struggles to find reasons to find a research subject.

episodes.name: Kingdom Come
episodes.overview: Hanssen finds an enexpected ally in Sacha as he battles to ensure Holby'survival, and an unwanted visitor compounds Donna's problems when she returns to work.

episodes.name: It Has To Be Now
episodes.overview: Oliver is determined to win funding for his chest wall rec0nstruction project, and Morven is faced with a shock from her past when she discovers the identity of Lofty's mystery patient.

episodes.name: Hungry Heart
episodes.overview: With the merger decision hanging over the hospital, Fredrik had his own future at Holby firmly on his mind, and Donna's friendship with Rik takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Hiding Places
episodes.overview: In light of Nina's news, Matteo can no longer run from their past, and Jac faces mounting pressures, both personal and professional. Meanwhile, an unwelcome visitor puts Donna in a tough position.

episodes.name: Group Animal, Part One
episodes.overview: A new face arrival in Holby sets the wheels of a change in motion, Jac is forced to assess her personal and professional lives, and Raf is reminded of why he fell in love with medicine.

episodes.name: Group Animal, Part Two
episodes.overview: t remains to be seen how the staff will cope when a face from the past arrives with a chilling vendetta.

episodes.name: We Need to Talk About Fredrik
episodes.overview: Dominic is determined to push new F1 Meena to the limit. With the hospital still recovering, Hanssen takes position at the front line on AAU.

episodes.name: Always Forever
episodes.overview: An overworked Morven finds herself torn between her past and her future on Christmas Eve. Essie is surprised to bond with Gaskell over an unusual patient.

episodes.name: The Prisoner
episodes.overview: Arriving in prison to begin his sentence, Ric struggles with the noise and aggression inside. Popular prisoner Dillon takes Ric under his wing, warning him against a fellow prisoner Danny. But when Danny requires urgent medical care, Ric has to decide whether to keep Dillon on side or follow his sense of duty.

episodes.name: Ready or Not
episodes.overview:
Sacha and Donna feel anxious when they have to admit an injured inmate from prison. After a conversation with Ric, Sacha is determined to find a way to protect his friend, but will he only make things worse?

Jac fills her schedule on her first day back in surgery but is wrong-footed when Gaskell challenges her with a complicated case. Frieda can only watch as Jac powers through, but will she come to regret it?

Essie gets an unexpected and unwanted surprise in the shape of Raf's inheritance. Gaskell offers his support as she muses on what to do with this burden, finally coming to an important decision.

episodes.name: There by the Grace of...
episodes.overview:
Encouraged by Sacha, Essie is having second thoughts about investing in Gaskell. But with Raf's legacy at stake, can Essie be assertive with Gaskell and find confidence in her decision?

With worries for Ric ringing in her ears, Donna is concerned that Sacha is off his game. With potential disaster looming, Donna enlists Nicky to help her take matters into her own hands.

Fletch's obsession with increased security reaches new heights, however Essie provides Fletch with a distraction and Jac ensures Fletch stays distracted for a long time to come.

episodes.name: Hanssen Is as Hanssen Does
episodes.overview:
The hospital picks up the pieces ahead of Raf's memorial. At a time when the Holby family need each other more than ever, can Hanssen find his way back to them?

Dead set on moving forward and maintaining her status as Holby's supersurgeon, Jac wants to fast track her recovery, but with reminders of the memorial all around, she can't outrun the past.

Lofty is thrown when an unexpected patient turns up on Keller. In spite of mounting stresses throughout the day, Lofty wonders whether his future with Dominic may be looking up.

episodes.name: One Day at a Time
episodes.overview: The Clinical trial is heating up and it is time for Gaskell to live up to his reputation, while Nicky tests Sacha's patience in a bid to prove her abilities .

episodes.name: Not Your Home Now
episodes.overview: Hanssen steps down as CEO, with Serena agreeing to take over temporarily. When Ric is admitted to Holby, Serena and Donna treat the injuries he sustained in prison. Distressed by Ric's situation, Serena investigates what happened the day Elaine Warren died. Oliver's physiotherapy is cut short when his therapist collapses, triggering his surgical instincts. As he attempts to diagnose her and other patients, Dom, Lofty and Roxanna try to temper his expectations. Oliver starts to wonder if he can still be a doctor. Jac must locate the rare vinyl she took from Raf's collection before Fletch purchases a replacement. This suspicious behaviour leads Frieda to uncover the true nature of Jac's motivations. Knowing Jac may have feelings for Fletch gives Frieda an opportunity to needle her mentor.

episodes.name: Precipice
episodes.overview: A leaking bullet is poisoning Oliver's brain and must be removed; can Roxanna convince him to risk another surgery? Fletch turns a supposed intruder into a patient.

episodes.name: Hard Day's Night
episodes.overview: A hungover Nicky must cope with an overbearing new registrar. Fletch and Jac are thrust together on an overnight transplant case.

episodes.name: Ache
episodes.overview: Roxanna pitches an experimental treatment that could help Oliver recover. However, with acting CEO Serena reluctant to commit, can Roxanna convince Hanssen to return? Meanwhile, Dominic tries to help a deeply worried Lofty plan for Sheilagh's future, and it remains to be seen whether Frieda will continue to help Jac when her mentor's pain reaches breaking point.

episodes.name: Square One
episodes.overview: Gaskell fights to protect his trial and save his patient, and Serena is determined to find a solution as she begins to fear that Ric is losing hope. Meanwhile, Jac returns with a spring in her step, but will the secret to her new happiness be discovered?

episodes.name: The L Word
episodes.overview: Roxanna tries to cure Oliver, but in the process opens old wounds. Dom and Lofty find themselves at odds over Sheilagh's care. Donna and Fletch race to save Ric.

episodes.name: No Matter Where You Go, There You Are – Part One
episodes.overview: The events surrounding Elaine Warren's death are relived in court. With new revelations emerging, can Ric fight for freedom? Desperate to no longer be Roxanna's pet patient, Ollie pushes himself to the brink. But what future awaits him on the other side? Jac has eyes for Fletch, but when things take a turn for the worse Frieda is the one she turns to for help.

episodes.name: No Matter Where You Go, There You Are – Part Two
episodes.overview: Ollie refuses to relinquish his determination to become a surgeon once again. But when a memory resurfaces, he finally sees a new way forward. Unable to shake the guilt over Fiona's death, Essie is hell-bent on uncovering what went wrong. With Jac gone and Fletch wanting answers, Frieda faces an interminable night shift on Darwin.

episodes.name: Tete a Tate
episodes.overview: Ric attempts to dive straight back into work, but hospital bureaucracy throws up some testing problems. Roxanna questions Gaskell's motives when he takes on a controversial new case. Fletch clashes with the new CEO over a vulnerable patient.

episodes.name: Tate Gallery
episodes.overview: A revelation about Gaskell forces Roxanna to choose where her loyalties lie. Still on probation, Ric risks his job to save a familiar face, and a secretive young patient causes Fletch to question Abigail's priorities.

episodes.name: New Ain't All It's Cracked Up To Be
episodes.overview: Frieda forces new trainee Nicky to question what kind of doctor she wants to be. Meena puts her friendship with Ms McKendrick on the line when a chance to impress Gaskell arises. Serena tests Xavier's mettle, putting him in charge of Sheilagh's recovery.

episodes.name: Only a Word
episodes.overview: Frieda has to decide what to do when Roman crashes back into her life, and a withdrawn Dom's plans for a quiet night are scuppered. Determined to shake up his life, Sacha seeks out new experiences - with surprising results.

episodes.name: None but the Brave
episodes.overview: With Fletch and Abigail's relationship still a secret, Fletch is thrown when Jac suddenly arrives on Darwin, however complications arise when Fletch accepts Jac's offer of an after-work drink. Loved-up Lofty is anxious not to crush Dominic's weekend plans, but when Lofty catches Sheilagh behaving recklessly, Lofty risks fracturing both relationships. On a high with patient success in Morocco, Gaskell's sceptical reaction to a new trial candidate leads to a disagreement with Roxanna.

episodes.name: Primum Non Nocere - Part One
episodes.overview: While trying to prove herself, Meena uncovers disturbing news that could spell trouble for Gaskell. Bernie returns to bring Serena home, but is Serena willing to leave Holby behind for good? And Fletch questions if he's ready to commit to a proper relationship with Abigail.

episodes.name: Fallen Idol
episodes.overview: A split-second mistake brings Nicky a whole lot closer to Zav than she bargained for. Meanwhile, a troubling discovery causes Roxanna to question her loyalties. And Dom is forced to make a choice between sacrificing an opportunity and letting down Lofty.

episodes.name: The Anniversary Waltz
episodes.overview: The party celebrating 70 years of the NHS is put on hold when a major incident pushes Holby to the limits. Serena is reminded of a patient she saved many years ago - with the odds stacked against her, and withRic's help, can she do the same again? Jac and Abigail find themselves at odds over a patient set for a heart transplant. But with Jac back at work, is the transplant Abigail's only concern? Sheilagh reflects on her stay at Holby and the importance of the NHS. Encouraged by Dom's feelings for her grandson, she gives Lofty one last present before she goes.

episodes.name: Into the Light
episodes.overview: Torn between a chance to make history and her conscience, Roxanna faces a tough decision. Will she cross the line? Hanssen's recovery is put to the test with Essie's arrival, but he'll have to overcome painful memories if he wants to save her life. When Donna's hopes for her family seem out of reach, Zav is the last person she expects to save the day - has she misjudged him?

episodes.name: The Friend Zone
episodes.overview: When nothing else seems to be going Sacha's way, he tries his hand at a new romance. Meanwhile, tensions rise as Meena moves in on Nicky's turf up on Darwin. And unconvinced by his slippery charm, Donna puts Zav to the test.

episodes.name: Two for Joy
episodes.overview: Jac is back on form after her surgery and determined to prove she is a doctor and not a patient. Dom and Lofty find themselves at cross purposes, which puts their future in the balance. Elsewhere, Essie sees Holby afresh through the eyes of a patient.

episodes.name: Child in Your Shadow
episodes.overview: A stressful day for Fletch gets worse when one of his kids is injured, and then a face from his past turns up. Meanwhille, Hanssen attempts to express his feelings to Roxanna, and Serena and Ric decide to teach Nicky and Meena a little humility.

episodes.name: Bygones
episodes.overview: Fletch clashes with estranged father Steven when Evie demands they let him back into their lives, while Essie is determined to help Josh after discovering he was an applicant for Gaskell's Project Laszlo. Dominic fears for his compatibility with Lofty after a contagious incident on AAU shows they are not thinking the same way.

episodes.name: Bargaining
episodes.overview: Roxanna questions Gaskell's leadership when his focus seems off. Can they work together to save a patient's life, or is the the trust between them fractured forever? Troubled Fletch throws himself into work as a distraction. When his micro-managing of Nicky puts a scared patient at risk, can Fletch find a way to forgive himself in time to put things right? Overworked and underappreciated, Serena is in no mood for games when a porters' prank goes awry. But is her short fuse making Serena too quick to judge?

episodes.name: All Business
episodes.overview: A conflicted Essie faces a dilemma when trial patient Josh's condition deteriorates, and Donna clashes with Xavier when she accuses him of not taking their beauty business seriously. Elsewhere, Meena tries to stay positive when her day goes from bad to worse.

episodes.name: Man Down
episodes.overview: A special episode focusing on male mental health. Long-serving Dr Sacha Levy struggles with his emotions after a devastating surgical outcome for a favourite patient. The episode departs from Holby's usual format, exploring previously shown scenes from a new perspective, as the shattered consultant looks back at a testing year at Holby.

episodes.name: Keep Your Friends Close
episodes.overview: Hanssen tries to bury himself in his work, but when Gaskell makes a move he hadn't bargained for, he can no longer ignore his conscience. Fletch is burning the candle at both ends, leaving Evie to pick up the slack. Desperate to make things right with his daughter, Fletch faces a tough decision, while an isolated Meena turns to an old flame for comfort.

episodes.name: All Lies Lead To The Truth
episodes.overview: An unexpected new friendship helps Frieda find her way and Meena hits a new low, finding herself friendless and under mounting pressure from all directions, while tensions between Roxanna and Gaskell finally come to a head.

episodes.name: One Man and His God
episodes.overview: While scrambling to save a life, Hanssen and Gaskell recall the earliest days of their friendship, when a fateful encounter with a wide-eyed but driven Roxanna changed the course of all their lives forever. Under increased scrutiny and immense pressure, Gaskell wrestles with his conscience.

episodes.name: Undoing
episodes.overview: Hanssen holds a fretful bedside vigil at the hospital, while Gaskell wrestles with his conscience over what he's done. Fletch is missing Evie and angrily blames Steven for pulling his family apart. Sacha tentatively steps back into Holby after time off for his depression - and finds an unexpected source of support in Frieda.

episodes.name: Inscrutable
episodes.overview: As the hospital reels from tragic news, Sacha takes on a marathon operation, but Dom is concerned that he is attempting to do too much too soon. Serena is pulled in all directions when Leah, a new junior doctor, struggles with a problematic first patient, while Fletch feels he should spend some quality time with his dad after Steven's heroics while helping Mikey.

episodes.name: The Three Musketeers
episodes.overview: Xavier's secrets are laid bare when his wounded grandfather arrives on AAU. Gaskell's increasingly erratic behaviour puts a patient at risk, leaving Hanssen troubled. Serena tries to put some professional distance between herself and Leah.

episodes.name: Stains
episodes.overview: With Hanssen inching closer to the truth, Gaskell fears exposure. Jac discovers Steven has been keeping a potentially life-changing secret from Fletch, and with Xavier continuing to distance himself from friends, Donna tries to repair his broken bonds with his family. But does Xavier really want her help?

episodes.name: Too Good to Be True
episodes.overview: Fletch finally confronts Jac over their feelings for each other. The death of a patient leads Jason to make a life-changing decision. Eager to protect his relationship with Dom, Lofty hides his true feelings about their future.

episodes.name: The Family You Choose
episodes.overview: A tricky case causes Xavier to lose his cool with Jason, while Jac and Fletch do their awkward best to avoid each other. Elsewhere, Lofty, Meena and Leah confront their problems after being thrown together.

episodes.name: Report to the Mirror - Part One
episodes.overview: The lines between past and present blur as Hanssen tries to bring the hospital back from the brink. Gaskell's descent into chaos leaves Jac fearing for her life, and Meena's crusade for truth faces a set-back when she loses the only ally she had left.

episodes.name: Report to the Mirror - Part Two
episodes.overview: With Gaskell's dastardly invention inside her, Jac fears for her life - but the only one who can remove this ticking time bomb is the man himself. Can she convince him to try? Meena throws caution to the wind and outs Gaskell's nefarious deeds, enlisting Essie's help in unravelling his web of lies.

episodes.name: One of Us
episodes.overview: Fletch and Sacha race against the clock, even calling on some familiar faces for help in Jac's hour of need. Meanwhile, Hanssen is determined to bury Gaskell's legacy, but is forced to unlock its final secret. And Donna is driven to make sense of her relationship with Xavier when he takes his personal pressures out on Jason.

episodes.name: Hold My Hand
episodes.overview: Serena fights chaos on the ward during a hospital inspection as Meena grapples with a momentous decision. Nicky goes all out to impress Mo and prove she deserves her place on Darwin. Meanwhile, Hanssen's wounds remain raw as he tries to lock Gaskell and his crimes in the past.

episodes.name: Love Is
episodes.overview: A beloved face from the past forces Serena to think about her future. Dom and Lofty find themselves at a crossroads when a game highlights the cracks in their relationship, and when Frieda and a difficult patient reach a place of understanding, Petrenko takes in an unlikely companion.

episodes.name: The Right Sort of Animal
episodes.overview: Love is in the air, but can Serena and Bernie overcome their issues? Meanwhile, when Jason and Greta's plans are thrown into chaos, Jason enlists Xavier's help. A despondent Dom realises he must fight for his relationship, but will a grand gesture be enough to win Lofty back? And when Mo pushes Nicky to reach her full potential, Nicky feels the pressure and questions if she's up to the challenge.

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.overview: An acquaintance from Nicky's past puts her in a difficult position. Will Nicky do the right thing? With a little nudge from Hanssen, a struggling Sacha finally opens up to a loved one. And Serena is forced to acknowledge what's really troubling her.

episodes.name: Best Christmas Ever
episodes.overview: Christmas Day opens up old wounds for Fletch, while an explosive family secret is exposed, and a mysterious Santa walks the halls of Holby. Recent events cause Hanssen to doubt his suitability for CEO, but when the team are faced with saving an esteemed colleague's life, will he change his mind?

episodes.name: Everything Old Is New Again
episodes.overview:
Jac, Ric and Sacha face off against old rivals while pitching for a million-pound prize fund. But as the competition threatens to divide the group, should they be more worried about their friends than their enemies?

Serena's new year is once again marked by tragedy when a loved one is brought in for emergency surgery. Dare Serena put her personal feelings aside and perform the operation to prevent history repeating itself?

episodes.name: China Crisis
episodes.overview:
A surprise blast from the distant past returns to run a Young Adult Unit alongside top consultant Ange Godard. He successfully puts everyone on tenterhooks with his notorious barbs and quips, until things take a surprising turn, much to everyone's surprise.

Nicky competes with Cameron for the junior doctor lead position only to realise that high accolades aren't everything when it to come to surgery.

Serena steps in to protect her ward when an old face from the past turns up and offends them. Serena fails to see the funny side and takes control.

episodes.name: The Burden of Proof
episodes.overview:
Ange finally allows Dominic the chance to work on her new unit, after much persistence, but she isn't sure whether he has the chops to be a great doctor. When Dominic is economical with the truth, Ange has to confront him and then feels that he's not trustworthy.

Nicky and Cameron find common ground when they have to work alongside an unforgiving Jac. Struggling to prove that he's worthy, Cameron goes all out to impress her. When things go wrong, will Cameron be forced to confront his own mistakes?

Ric's former wife Lola returns to Holby to work alongside her former flame on AAU. Serena and Zav are highly amused by the tension between them, but Ric soon realises that he actually has residual feelings for his ex. But are they reciprocated?

episodes.name: A Daring Adventure or Nothing at All
episodes.overview:
Frieda is happy her life is on an even keel, but her contentment is shattered when her ex-boyfriend Roman unexpectedly reappears. Can a wary Frieda open her heart and dare to imagine a future she had thought was gone for good?

With their relationship going well, Xavier is keen to step up and ease the burdens weighing on a stressed Donna. But all does not entirely go to plan when Zav embarks on some impromptu parenting of Mia.

Ange feels the pressure as she works to sell her vision for her Young Adult Unit while treating a difficult and vulnerable patient. But striving to be all things to all people, Ange fails to get to grips with the behaviour of a returning colleague who might really need help.

episodes.name: Mad as Hell
episodes.overview:
When Holby is overwhelmed by a winter crisis, Ric goes above and beyond to treat his patients. But as the pressure reaches fever pitch, can he continue to accept Holby surviving on nothing more than good will and the occasional miracle?

To Jac and Fletch's concern, a grief-stricken Frieda immerses herself completely in work, but when she's challenged by a patient's confrontational father, and with her emotions running high, Frieda embarks on a fight she has to win.

When Ange has her work cut out on YAU thanks to an obstinate teenager, it's down to Essie to persuade an unwilling Ange to enlist help from a source who's a bit too close to home.

episodes.name: Force Majeure
episodes.overview:
When a family secret is exposed, the dispute causes a young patient to delay vital surgery, but fearing the consequences of such a decision, a concerned Ange must find a way to make her reconsider.

Keen to highlight the constant pressures Holby faces on a daily basis, Ric enlists the help of an influential acquaintance. But when an innocent patient is caught up in his personal crusade will Ric do the right thing?

When the opportunity to attend an overseas conference arises, Nicky and Cameron must battle it out, but with Nicky running on empty does she have the strength to come out on top?

episodes.name: Good Side
episodes.overview:
While Holly's condition weighs heavily on an emotionally invested Ange, Holly's distraught parents must put their differences aside to make a heartbreaking decision, but are they prepared for what lies ahead?

When new locum Chloe covers on Darwin, a smitten Cameron sets out to impress, but with a tricky patient keeping him on his toes will Cameron step up to the plate?

There's no love lost between Xavier and Carole, so when a disgruntled Xavier is tasked with treating spiritual Carole, it's clear she's not the only one in pain.

episodes.name: Never Say Never
episodes.overview:
Zosia arrives at Holby keen to get back working on Darwin. With her knack for irritating Jac in full swing, will Jac be able to track down Frieda before Zosia gets too comfortable?

Ange struggles with Holly's parents who are intent on fighting for their daughter. When an offer of hope for radical treatment comes from America, Ange does her best to make them see what is really best for their daughter.

Donna and Xavier struggle to keep their domestic arguments at home - will being forced to work closely together for the day sort out their differences or drive them further apart?

episodes.name: Guts
episodes.overview:
Zosia's big news gets a mixed response, and Jac remains suspicious about her real reasons for returning to Holby. Zosia's situation is further complicated when a handsome American turns up wanting to tempt her back across the Atlantic.

Sasha is rattled and embarrassed when an old flame appears on the ward with their ill partner. Following diagnosis, Sasha gets to try out his new transplant procedure and by the end of the day has two reasons to celebrate.

Following an incident with protestors, Jason refuses to leave Hanssen's office until his demands are met. Despite Serena’s pleading, he stands firm and eventually a difficult decision is made about a long-term patient, much to Ange’s annoyance.

episodes.name: Powerless
episodes.overview:
A computer virus shuts down Holby’s power, putting Jac and Connie at loggerheads as they fight against all odds and in makeshift conditions to save the lives of close friends and colleagues.

During a hospital-wide evacuation, Ric mounts a daring rescue for a trapped and weakening Essie – even as he struggles with a shocking revelation about Darla.

In the midst of chaos, can Ange and Serena agree on how best to care for Holly, who continues on life-support?

episodes.name: A Simple Lie, Part 1
episodes.overview: A desperate Ange pleads with Holly’s family to see reason, but when the ruling comes back, the anger finally boils over with devastating consequences for Fletch. Ric's son Kofi arrives at Holby wanting to find out what’s going on with Darla. Struggling to keep his granddaughter's pregnancy a secret, Ric battles to keep his family together and do what’s right for everyone. An excited Zosia looks forward to working with Frieda, only she doesn’t get the reception she was expecting. As the pair team up to tackle a case, Zosia does her best to win over Frieda, with hilarious results.

episodes.name: A Simple Lie, Part Two
episodes.overview: As the protesters grow angrier Holby tightens security, Fletch realises there may be darker forces at play with Theo’s disappearance. Chloe struggles to decide if staying at Holby is the right thing to do. Dom tries to persuade her, but is thrown off by a surprise visitor. A romantic evening doesn’t go as planned for Xavier and Donna when his mother arrives, putting Donna in a difficult position.

episodes.name: Running
episodes.overview:
Ange follows a hunch and ends up uncovering a shocking and long buried secret – one with the potential to tear her life completely apart.

A downbeat Frieda faces tough choices when an old friend of Roman’s appears in Holby in desperate need of help. Can she manage to work within the system and play by the rules?

Cameron and Xavier are forced together on Darwin, where Xavier appears to take delight in Cameron’s dating woes.

episodes.name: Ask No Questions
episodes.overview:
Chloe is surprised and immediately wrongfooted when ex-boyfriend Evan unexpectedly turns up on Darwin Ward. Is it possible he’s simply there to care for his sister Phoebe?

As Ange reels from her recent earth-shattering discovery and tries to plan her next move, Carole unexpectedly confronts Dominic with painful and long-buried secrets from his past.

In the midst of a chaotic shift, Donna is surprised by Mia’s unexpected appearance – forcing Donna to navigate some sensitive parenting territory.

episodes.name: The Family Way
episodes.overview:
A bewildered Dom struggles to come to terms with a shocking family secret and he immerses himself in work. However being around Ange

proves difficult, causing Dom to make a drastic decision about his career. Will Ange convince Dom to change his mind? Donna will do anything to protect her daughter, but when she oversteps the line in a well-meaning attempt to shield Mia, Donna’s parenting is called into question. Though Serena offers some sound advice, can Donna accept Mia is growing up?

An enthusiastic Zosia is keen to take on more challenging cases but Jac, still privately resentful towards Zosia, sidelines her. Feeling disgruntled, Zosia undermines Jac’s authority, but it only adds strain to their already fraught relationship.

episodes.name: North and South
episodes.overview: A startling incident forces Zosia to reconsider her future at Holby, Cameron has to treat a close relative of Xavier's, and Dom tries to keep Carole at arm's length.

episodes.name: Pleased to Meet You
episodes.overview: Jac’s top-dog status is challenged when a talented new surgeon starts at Holby and instantly causes a stir. Dom is irritated when Carole starts work on reception, and Ange tries to limit family fallout. Donna is flattered to be offered a new career opportunity, but does she really want the extra responsibility?

episodes.name: Vinegar and Honey
episodes.overview: Kian’s big personality and alternative methods are beginning to grate on Jac, but is it just a case of professional jealousy? Fletch reminds her that she’s only as good as her team and should allow him to thrive. Dom tells Ange he wants to be a proper part of her and Chloe’s lives. In response Ange finally opens up to Dom, revealing a big family secret. When Sue makes a big mistake on her first day at the new job, Donna covers it up. However being the favourite of the new boss poses new challenges.

episodes.name: Ex Marks the Spot
episodes.overview: Ange plans to tell Chloe her biggest secret, but a surprise locum throws her day into disarray. Ric’s granddaughter, Darla, arrives at Holby, forcing Ric to deal with her pregnancy head on. Kian rallies Nicky and Cameron to help him find out who Jac’s mystery patient is.

episodes.name: The Wrong Horse
episodes.overview:
As Chloe tries to come to terms with the news that Dominic is her half-brother, she’s forced to operate with him and Ange. But as tension boils over and Evan helps her uncover a home truth, will Chloe be able to cope?

Lofty returns to Holby after the holiday of a lifetime. With something clearly on his mind, he wants to speak to Dominic but misses his moment when he learns that Ange is Dominic’s birth mother. But what is Lofty hiding, and who is just around the corner?

When an infestation of rodents takes refuge at Sacha’s home, he decides it’s time to move out of Jac’s house and leave her in peace. Jac worries whether he’s really ready, but what will Sacha do to convince her?

episodes.name: Unredeemed
episodes.overview: Dominic faces his difficult past when he goes head to head with his abusive ex, Isaac. Ange and Carole band together in order to cope with the fact that Isaac has returned, affecting Dominic’s life. Jac’s conscience is thrown into conflict when she meets a previous patient who has something she wants. How far will she go for personal gain?

episodes.name: Bloodline
episodes.overview: Will Lofty and Dom’s marriage survive under the pressure of Isaac’s presence at Holby, and is Sacha’s relationship with Patricia over before it’s even begun?

episodes.name: In the Right Place
episodes.overview: As Dom and Isaac grow closer, is Dom at risk of falling under his spell? Hanssen finds himself in unfamiliar territory when an estranged relative arrives at Holby, and Chloe gets an unpleasant surprise when she returns to work.

episodes.name: Over My Dead Body
episodes.overview:
The manipulative Isaac continues to drive a wedge between Dom and Lofty, but when Isaac puts Lofty in harm’s way and the net is closing in, is Isaac’s fate sealed?

Good intentions backfire for Cameron when an intervention doesn’t go his way, but when faced with an opportunity to protect Chloe, Cameron makes a selfless gesture.

Hanssen must navigate the world of parenting to figure out what’s troubling his unusually quiet grandson Oskar.

episodes.name: Pigeon
episodes.overview: When Xavier’s mum arrives on AAU talking in riddles, Donna does her best to shelter him from her behaviour - but will he appreciate the intervention? Sacha makes a romantic gesture but finds something unexpected in Patricia’s cleaning cupboard. Nicky turns her nose up at working with Jac, who ensures she’ll live to regret it.

episodes.name: Kiss Kiss
episodes.overview: Xavier tries to build bridges with Donna, but she’s having none of it. Cameron can’t quite shift his feelings of unease around Evan, and when he overhears a phone call his suspicions are confirmed. And Fletch is anxious about his first official date with Ange, especially when work threatens to get in the way.

episodes.name: Flying Solo
episodes.overview: Cameron tries to prove himself to Kian, but they clash over Kian's teaching methods. A frustrated Xavier gets relationship advice from the most unlikely source, and Carole opens up to Hanssen about her woes with Dominic and impending divorce.

episodes.name: Reckless
episodes.overview: Chloe’s day is thrown into chaos when Evan is attacked. With his life on the line, Evan asks Chloe a surprising question. Dominic is put under pressure when a surprise visitor arrives at Holby looking for Lofty. Wanting to keep his marriage intact, Dominic is forced to make a difficult decision. And after a night of partying together, Serena and Fleur Fanshawe are thrown together to help a patient on AAU.

episodes.name: Honeymoon
episodes.overview: As her loved ones continue to worry about her, Chloe learns more about Evan. Cameron wants to get out from under Bernie’s shadow, but he receives some devastating news. Hanssen learns that his grandson is not the only one who believes in the tooth fairy.

episodes.name: Don't Leave Me
episodes.overview: On the anniversary of a personal tragedy, Kian decides he must save a life today. Hanssen worries that with his family history he shouldn’t look after Oskar and wonders whether nature or nurture will have a greater effect on his grandson. Cameron struggles to accept some recent news and refuses help from Alex. When Serena tries to help him, she receives surprising news.

episodes.name: Things My Mother Told Me
episodes.overview: As the Holby team give a warm send off to a much beloved colleague, a surprising revelation sends Cameron into a spin. However, Cameron crosses the line when his drunken behaviour spills onto the ward.

episodes.name: When Worlds Collide
episodes.overview: Jac’s work-life balance is called into question when her ex’s new fiancee arrives at Holby with Emma in tow, and she’s forced to make a career changing decision. Will life on Darwin ever be the same? As Serena's tough façade slowly unravels, is grief finally catching up with her? And Dominic is on a mission to find out what Hanssen and Carole are secretly up to.

episodes.name: Work-Life Balance
episodes.overview: Is Chloe brave enough to tell Evan she wants a divorce? And what will he do if she does? Faced with choosing between work and his personal life, will Hanssen learn from past mistakes? And will having their therapist as a patient bring Dom and Lofty closer or push them further apart?

episodes.name: Where Does It Hurt?
episodes.overview: A distressed stranger turns up looking for Raf di Lucca. Will her secret change Essie’s life forever? Xav questions Ric’s competence, but is Ric’s outrage hiding a graver concern? Nicky learns to trust her instincts – and that includes suspicions about sinister Evan too.

episodes.name: Babysitters and Bystanders
episodes.overview: Chloe's day is thrown into chaos when Evan's sister, Phoebe, returns to Holby. Essie is left torn when she is forced to make a difficult decision, and a high profile patient is admitted to AAU, but are things exactly as they seem?

episodes.name: The Perfect Storm
episodes.overview: Jac is rocked when Faye Morton returns to Holby bringing Joseph with her. Sacha struggles to do the right thing for a family grieving their mother.

episodes.name: Gods and Monsters
episodes.overview: A friendly face from the past gives Ric someone to confide in. Fletch goes on a mission that could cost him his relationship with Ange.

episodes.name: Circle of Life
episodes.overview: Fearing something may be wrong with him, Ric is absent when his granddaughter, Darla, goes into early labour. When Isla requires emergency surgery, Essie’s lie that she’s her adopted mother is in danger of being exposed. And as Chloe tries to move on from Evan, she has a feeling that he’s watching her.

episodes.name: Retreat
episodes.overview: Evan refuses to give up on Chloe and proves what a real threat he can be. Cameron abandons his quest to help Ric when he receives heart-breaking news.

episodes.name: Divine Justice
episodes.overview: Will it be Chloe or Evan’s version of events that will be believed? How can a grieving Cameron make amends for failing Chloe when she needed him most? And what will an MRI scan reveal about Ric’s future?

episodes.name: This Be the Verse
episodes.overview: Both Ric and Darla are faced with life-changing decisions, an aggressive stranger at the hospital threatens to blow Essie’s baby secret wide open, and will Kian be able to mend the heart of an old flame?

episodes.name: Hope is a Powerful Drug
episodes.overview: Essie is torn when Frankie returns wanting to take Isla home, Ric is caught between Serena and top neurosurgeon Max McGerry as they clash over his treatment options, and Jac returns from holiday and wastes no time in winding up a stressed Kian.

episodes.name: Promise
episodes.overview: Max performs dangerous brain surgery on Ric, who must confront his own mortality. Dom is shocked when Helen returns to Holby and Lofty finds out she’s pregnant.

episodes.name: Hubble Bubble
episodes.overview: It’s Halloween and Cameron is haunted by his own ghosts. Jac receives a bombshell from Stacey, and will Dominic overstep the mark when it comes to Lofty’s baby?

episodes.name: Remember, Remember
episodes.overview: In Holby City’s 1,000th episode, Jac is due to perform a milestone surgery, but will personal issues cloud her judgement? It’s Holby City Hospital’s 150th birthday and a familiar face returns for Fletch’s VIP celebration, but why are they really here? Ric is discharged from hospital, but is this the last Holby will ever see of the legendary surgeon?

episodes.name: Sandra's Choice
episodes.overview: As Elliot’s concern for Jac grows, will he ever be able to tell her his secret? Lofty is determined to be there for his new family, but will it be smooth sailing from here? Sacha is conflicted when his feelings for Essie resurface.

episodes.name: We Are All the Stars
